content.detailedDescription: My mother was actually the first to spot it. she was outside smoking a cigarette, looking out at our farm which was across the road. suddenly she spotted an odd hovering oval like ball of light that appeared out of nowhere. it had just turned 11 pm and she rushed inside to get me. i walked out into the garage and saw it too. at first i thought it was just a lost airplane but it wasn't moving, and there are no air ports for miles around. not only that but we live in the middle of nowhere, hours away from any big city. we agreed we should check it out, because it was over private property and we had animals to look out for. as soon as we crossed the road in my mother's car it started to move. we followed it further toward's the back of the farm. suddenly it disappeared. we stopped and waited. it was odd because we couldn't hear anything, not even crickets or cicadas and it was in the middle of summer. suddenly it reappeared, but back towards the south. we reversed and followed. it would suddenly descend then ascend. the second time it took us towards the back (aka the north) it disappeared once more. then suddenly it came back with a second weird white oval. they both hovered before shooting forward a small ways. then one by one disappeared. we never saw either one again. our small town has more cows than people, and most are over the age of 50. there's no way it could have been a normal plane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Weird orb spotted above family farm disappeared then reappeared with another. followed but was evasive then disappeared. no clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
What made me go onto my deck was the sound of the seagulls in distress. all of the birds were in a panic mode at 3 am a little unusual. i saw a light in the air coming from the burch bay area of washington state. i observed something by the white rock beach peir. i tried to record it but my phone is not that good quality. i looked above me and managed to get a short video of it
 that lasted for 1 minute and 25 seconds which my friend showed me to post it on youtube to see if we could get a better look at it. so youtube posted ufo by james. posted a few days ago . this is the exact same object that was recorded in eugen oregon on may 20th. the reason i stopped recording was....All of a sudden and unexpected very quickly my hairs on the back of my neck stood up and i am not a guy who gets spooked easily. but i swear there was something behind me. i was on the top of the deck the roof was behind me. nobody could have sneaked up behind me. 5 days later i am still really freaked out. i refuse to go out after dark. i am not a liar i am not crazy person and i would not waste your time on this. but the same object up the coast line around the same time. please please please have somebody email me. i am not a computer savvy person as i said i have a recording of it. it's not a good video but i have it.
content.summary: Circle object it had same thing reported in eugen oregon

content.detailedDescription: Second day witnessed a pulsating object at neer the same time and at the same area of sky as previous day. object second day was moving in a straight line instead of hovering. object stayed on path until it vanished over the horizon. wind direction at time was southwest 1-5 knots.
content.summary: Pulsating floating object moving in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived at in laws house after long drive. it was 3 in the morning, i got out of passenger side of car, i was stretching and looked up at sky. it was a clear starry night and my attention went to a void area of no stars in the sky. i was in a small town so there were lots of stars in the sky. a section of sky was missing stars. when i looked closer i saw the void was a very large craft, rectangular in shape and at least the size of a football field or larger. no lights. it was dark grey and had multi dimensions all over the surface. it was silent but had some kind of hum or noise you wouldn't of heard unless your attention was on it. it was moving slow, slower than a two seater small plane and was low in the sky not far above the tree lines. it was just cruising by. very very visible. because it was so low it went out of sight going over trees and houses. i may have the dates off a little, in was in the early 80's. i was speechless at the time it happened, just frozen and starring up at it!
content.summary: Very large rectangular craft just above tree line, moving very slow, no lights,no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Siting in garden
didn't see any objects just took photo and it showed 
not a clue norhing in front of me when i took the photo.
all i saw is what's in the photo.
didn't make sence as i didn't see anything when i took the photo.
it was a photo took another one and nothing there.
content.summary: Took photo from my phone into the blank sky to see this once it developed

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to a restaurant on a hill with my parents and took photos to the coast after dinner. i saw the objects when reviewing them on my computer. i thought they where nothing close to an airplane or birds since they looked aligned in formation and the first thing it came to my mind was unrecognized flying objects. in one photo, there is one object in boomerang form and another egg-like object on top of it. i felt surprised when looking at them because a casual trip photo can turn into an evidence of something beyond comprehension. they were static or moved very fast.
content.summary: I was taking photos to the coastline sight to the east from a restaurant on a hill called "la finca" in naguabo, puerto rico. i realized the strange objects when reviewing the photos on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: I took a 30sec long exposure of the night sky from my window at around 1:30am using my mobile phone (huawei p9) and captured this object which is considerably different to anything else in the image, (background stars etc) the camera was completely stationary during the exposure. the night previous, i spent a long time looking at a particular star which was flickering red and blue, and this object seems to have appeared in a similar area of the sky. it  has a distinct form, almost like a donut or globular sphere.
content.summary: I took a 30sec long exposure of the night sky and captured this object

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing a wedding. whilst the bride, groom and guests sat for the meal, i went outside of the venue into the garden area, i took 2 photos, one straight after the other of the garden area, it was a cloudy overcast evening. when i uploaded the photos i noticed lights etc in one of the photos and not the other which had been taken a fraction of a second straight after. this may be lens flair however when i zoomed into one of the lights, similar to a triangle, it appears to be a solid object. i of course don't know this for sure and like i have said, it may well be lens flair but i am sending you both photos for your attention.
content.summary: Lights noticed in the sky after photo had been taken.

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and i were standing outside enjoying a fire when he pointed up and said what's that thing? i then noticed a bright orange light/orb to the west. we started trying to identify the craft and we eliminated that it could be a fixed wing aircraft. i thought it could be a helicopter since there is some helicopter traffic in the area but we soon eliminated that as the object continued flying east towards us since it made no sound and the bright orange light was not normal for a helicopter. i that it could be a chinese lantern but the flight path seemed controlled from west to east. my neighbor went to grab his wife and i took my phone out to begin filming the orange orb but then it pulsated and fizzled out as soon as i attempted to film it. it was definitely unusual as we do have air traffic in the area but since i am familiar with most of the aircraft and can identify most aircraft. i am curious not see if we can identify the orange object and to see if there are any other witnesses .
content.summary: We saw a bright orange light flying in a straight path from west to a east

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on interstate 5 and coming up to milepost 99 at the stroke of midnight. i could see hills close by and more in the distance. just above the hills in the distance i saw a light change from blue through the color cycle to orange as it descended apparently straight down. i thought i was seeing a plane go down, maybe on fire. i could not see as it well as i drove through dark curves but appeared awfully close to the hills in the distance, but as i moved along the closer hills and trees obstructed my view as the object descended.

i had a cell phone and called 911 and was not sure whether that was the thing to do but i honestly felt i saw a plane going down. i was informed that i had connected to grants pass/ josephine county 911 and would be transferred to roseburg/douglass county 911. 

i reported to the operator that i thought i saw a plane crashing in the hills. at exactly 12:00 at milepost 99 on interstate 5

the operator said little but after taking the report made an interesting comment. the night before a woman had called at the same time and the same hour reporting the same thing from the same location! she said it was very strange to hear the same report from the same location two nights in a row at the same time.

i did not see nor hear any news reports of a plane crash in the area in the days following.

a few weeks later my car broke down going south at exactly milepost 99, and realized i had broken down at the same spot before, and exactly where i saw the light.

i say i saw this object to the east but that assumes that the stretch of interstate 5 runs n/s which it curves through the mountains there. for all i know the interstate may even run e/w at milepost 99
content.summary: Light changing color as apparently lands ...Plane crash?

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette on march 13 , 1997 at approximately 10pm (estimated).

i looked up in the sky directly overhead and saw in the distant sky a small triangle. it did not move as i observed it for several minutes. i went in the house to get my wife. i had not described what i had seen at all to my wife only that she needed to come out and see something. as i returned to the dark area i could no longer see it as i looked upwards. i said, "i think going into the light affected my eyes and can no longer see it". she exclaimed, "no, i see it". i asked where and she pointed her arm various directions saying, "there, there and there, its a triangle". it was apparently an equilateral triangle. i said "wow, it must have dropped straight down, it was a tiny (in comparison) triangle in the sky."

we stayed there and looked at this thing in awe. we observed a (possibly convex) surface between the lights but if i had to say what i think i saw is that surface was projecting an image of the stars above it, as if there were a camera on top of the triangle and the lower side was a huge display screen. i worked as a television engineer i was accustomed to observing slight variations in brightness and contrast and i felt i was seeing a false image of the sky above through this triangular object. the black of the sky inside the triangle was not as black as the night sky. also because we could see the lights and the apparent surface we estimated that this object was quite close and quite huge, no it was massive. my wife claimed to see some slight disruptions in the surface such as portals, but i could not see them. we estimated that night, it must have been 300 yards across. we observed it for probably 1/2 hour, the whole time discussing what we were seeing.  it did not move at all during that time, not in the least that we could tell. we agreed to not discuss what we had seen. we had discussed every detail of what we were seeing in that 30 minutes between us and felt there was nothing more to observe, and went inside. the object remained. amazingly, it did not seem ominous or scary neither of us were afraid. we were quite surprised though to see something so big and so close, even though it was an attempt to camouflage itself in the night sky it was not 100% effective. 

the next day our neighbor to the back came running through the field asking us if we had seen anything the night before. we both denied it and asked what he saw. he said it was a triangle and it was huge. i then admitted we had seen it but agreed to not discuss it.  later, my wife and i went near a local football field knowing it was 100 yards across and as i stopped at what i figured to be the approximate distance of the object in the sky the night before. i asked my wife if she agreed the football field was now about the same distance as the object in the sky the night before . the triangle we had seen was three times the size of the football field confirming our previous estimation of 300 yards.  

although i make this report many years later i can say for certain the date. you see my neighbor that also saw it, had connections to phoenix az. he had someone in phoenix send him a copy of a phoenix newspaper from the day after the night of the phoenix lights. he returned a few days later showing us the newspaper.  it was definitely the same night of the phoenix lights. if not for that detail, i would have never remembered the date. 

the night of the phoenix lights was seen at least as far north as southern oregon. to date, other than the three of us that saw it that night , i have never heard other reports of it in oregon.

had it not been the night of the phoenix lights i would have written it off as a top secret military craft. upon further evaluation however i fee there is no way the us military had so many "top secret" craft in the sky that it was seen from sonora to oregon.
content.summary: Saw small triangle in sky went to get wife and returned to fin huge triangle

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were watching a movie in my backyard on a projector.It was about 11:10 at night. there were 7 of us. i noticed a strange disc hovering over my house at a moderate speed. it was lower than an airplane but a bit higher that a bird. the craft gave off an odd dull dark red glow but the craft appeared to be a dark violet color. when i was about to point it out 2 of my friends did. sadly it flew out of sight before i could get a picture. the craft appeared to be a classic ufo dish shaped object. it was deeply unsettling but it was cool to experience a ufo sighting.
content.summary: Classic ufo dish shape. was a strange dark violet color with a dim dark red ring around the edges. it was traveling low and flew right over my house. me and 2 other of my friends saw it at the same time while we were watching an outdoor movie.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed object in sky appearing to be mylar balloon reflecting the sun. object appeared to be floating and pulsating light, lighter and darker. object vanishes and reappears. recorded video. wasn't until playback that multiple objects were noticed -- flying. 

witness 2: i saw the same shiny object in the sky. it appeared to be moving in and out of vision in a floating motion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed an objective hovering at high altitude. thought the object was a mylar balloon. object seemed to rotate reflecting sun then vanished. recorded video of object. notice on playback multiple objects!

content.detailedDescription: Was at the botanical gardens in scottsdale. it was about 11:30 am. i was facing west. i had my 800mm camera in hand, taking photos of desert flowers, not using the full zoom. just happened to look up at a jet stream and the jet, flying southeast at a high altitude. while staring at the jet stream behind it, i noticed a very small glint of light , moving below the jet stream. as small as a pin head three feet away, it was tiny. i was wearing prescription sun glasses, amber in color. thought at first it was my glasses, took them off and looked up. no glint of light. glasses were clean. only could see the glint thru my glasses. turned on my zoom, and got three photos of it. the photos are a little fuzzy, but still not bad. it is acorn shape, with a small dome on top. i guess about 2-3 miles away, guess over 300 feet wide, or wider. had two engines , one on either side, near the top rim. also was very shinny and reflected the sun light, strongly. it was moving side to side,very little. it then tilted about 80 degrees, kind of lopsided. it then would disappear and then reappear in the same place, did this 4 or 5 times. then one of the engines got very bright, and then went out. then both engines got very bright , and it took off, then disappeared quickly. this all lasted less than 3 minutes. i have seen many ufo's , nothing new for me, and encounters. never seen this acorn shape before. never seen glowing engines ? before. ufo's are nothing new for me. but having camera in hand is a first. i have the photos to prove it. i do this as a sharing service, and will put my photos up for examination if asked. not sure how to download them, but will do so if asked and shown how to, they are fairly clear. mufon can contact me. welcome your comments, could be experimental craft also, but had no wings. thanks for looking.
content.summary: Was out walking in scottsdale, had camera in hand, looked up at a high altitude jet stream, saw a glint shinning

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving indiana at 10:20pm on county rd 100 in tippecanoe county on 5/27/2017.
i saw a reddish orange light in the northwest sky. i thought that is the closest
that i have ever sceen a planet to earth. i thought that can't be mars. i jumped 
out of my truck at that time it started moving south across the sky. i took my phone 
out and got some pictures. it continued to move very fast in a southwest direction 
and climbing very fast then vanished. i got some pictures. it is an red orange cylander 
with a ring in the center. there is no way an earthly man made aviation object could
 move like this. i was kind of in shock and rushed home to tell my family about it 
and show them the photos. i then went over to my neighbors and told him about it and showed him the pictures. he is the one that told me about the mufon website.
content.summary: Sighted bright orang planet like object stationary thought at first planet very close then moved across sky climbed very fast and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting family in etna california, and we went out to feed their horses in fort jones. the night crept up fast and we were feeding them in the back field and someone said to look up. as we threw the hay off the truck we observed a bright white glowing ball moving across the sky in a strange pattern. it came from the east and headed north.  had it been still it would have look like a glowing planet or the north star as the best way to describe it., but this object moved in a strange pattern across the sky heading in the direction of mount shasta. we observed it until it was no longer seen.
content.summary: Large glowing orb in a clear night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting family in etna california, and we went out to feed their horses in fort jones. the night crept up fast and we were feeding them in the back field and someone said to look up. as we threw the hay off the truck we observed a bright white glowing ball moving across the sky in a strange pattern. it came from the east and headed north.  had it been still it would have look like a glowing planet or the north star as the best way to describe it., but this object moved in a strange pattern across the sky heading in the direction of mount shasta. we observed it until it was no longer seen.
content.summary: Large glowing orb in a clear night sky

content.detailedDescription: Object traveled west to north west zigzagging and backtracking looked similar to a satellite however changed direction several times rapidly.
content.summary: Much like a sattlite however changed directions several times

content.city: Rio Dulce, Fronteras and Lago Izabal
content.detailedDescription: It was late afternoon 6:16 pm on may 27, 2017 sitting outside below terraza roof, friend called and said to go outside and look straight up, multiple witnesses in town and across country, in social media etc. two very bright disc like lights (this was seen thru a pair of quality binoculars. took photos and video, watched objects continue path west after hoverin for approximately ten minutes and appeared to ascendto pinpoints and disappear from sight.
content.summary: Lights appeared over head coming in tandem, hovered, continued west and appeared to ascend to pinpoints until gone
content.locationName: Rio Dulce, Fronteras and Lago Izabal, Izabal Department

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after relocating to arizona, i was sightseeing in a remote section of estrella mountain regional park near goodyear. suddenly, and without any apparent sound, two silvery, reflective (or glowing) disc-shaped objects transited the area travelling generally west to east at a high rate of speed. the second object was trailing the first, it is difficult to accurately gauge their altitude or speed, but my impression was that they were perhaps 2000 feet agl, and passed perhaps a mile north of my position travelling at an estimated 300 nmph. before i could raise my old olympus digital camera and point it in the general area of the objects, they were already distant. they can still be seen at center of this photo either reflecting sunlight or glowing brightly.
content.summary: Silvery disc shaped craft transit estrella mountain regional park

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw this flying object it was about 14 months ago me and my buddy who ill call steve were driving off from my mothers house when he says hey bruh look up n when i looked up all i could see was a huge black rectangular object moving slowly on top of us n i say honk bro see what happens which we did n nothin happened well after 10-15 seconds it passes over tree line n out of sight i was like bruh aliens steve jus kept repeating the words military drone over an over n sort of a shock.
well the 21st of this month i wake up from work to prep for the upcoming shift ( yes i get to sleep at work i have the best job ever n am so happy for it ) i went outside around 5:45am when the sky was kinda grey n foggy but still clear if that makes any sense so i turn off my flood lights to refill with fuel and when i shut off the lights i noticed 4 lights over me it was the same object it had its four center lights but not exactly in the middle a little off to the left of the aircraft n its gotta be 2-2 1/2 football fields long if not bigger an its shape is like a rectangle with the two corners folded back to make a sort of flat v shape \____________/ like that n when i ran inside to grab my phone to record with i noticed my phone said 6:39am theres no way i jus skipped 55 minutes without knowing i wasnt able to finish my prep in time n ive still been wondering what went on i contacted yall the same day which i was told id be called back by a glenda n she never called someone else did n didnt really want to take this report iver the phone, n o yea when id come back oitside after looking at the time on my phone it had vanished like nothing was ever there.
content.summary: If someone were to tell me this id say bullshit

content.detailedDescription:
5/27/17 saturday 9:30 pm queens, nyc maspeth/middle village area - standing in backyard, everything very quiet, absolutely no sound disruptions. temperature 62 degrees, wind 1.5 mph, heavy cloud cover all day.  

backyard was dark, looked up at sw sky approximately over maspeth area.  observed giant stationary pulsating light behind cloud cover.  light was in a perfect circle.  diameter of light could be compared to 3 city blocks, appeared much larger than sun or moon does in the sky.  

colors pulsing slowly were red, white, violet-blue, mostly red.  my first thought that it was a plane but it did not move.  then i thought perhaps it was a helicopter but there was absolutely no noise and no vibration. helicopters in the area can always be heard and felt. light cast was much wider than any plane or helicopter could ever cast.  

light pulsated for approx. 3-4 minutes then disappeared.  it did not move in any direction, simply shut off.  again, this was behind cloud cover.  i could not determine the source of the light.

note: most queens residents are very familiar with all sorts of planes, helicopters as we live under the constant flight patterns of jfk and laguardia airports.  planes pass over our heads constantly. commercial aircraft is a part of our lives.  

additional note:  military jets flew over the neighborhood today at approx. 3:50 pm.  there was cloud cover and they couldn't be seen but distinctly could be heard and felt. the noise was incredible and it shook the house. this is unusual.  military jets do not fly over this part of queens at low altitude ever.  the only other time we heard jets like that was right after 9/11.
content.summary: 5/27/17 9:30 pm queens nyc giant silent stationary multi-colored pulsating light behind cloud cover 4 minute duration

content.detailedDescription: Observed a sphere like object in sky maybe 500 feet to 1000 feet in air. had some light like color while in the air sort of violet and at times like a greyish color and i watched it move from point a to point b in air and the seen it had 4 spheres around it. it landed about 200 feet rom me and there was a slight chime like sound when it was really close to ground. as it was about to land it appeared as if the 4 smaller sphere was getting closer o middle main phere and as far as i could see the four spheres went into the landing sphere. i made my way to object and found the perfect sphere resting onto the dry ground. at first i considered it was maybe a space fuel tank of some sort like oxygen tank or such. after about 10 minutes of observing the object from about 10 feet away i decided to get closer and as i did the light slowly faded away and i could still hear what sounded like chimes playing but very very slowly. i went back to my pickup truck to get a pair of gloves and when i went to return to object it had moved closer to where my truck was parked by about one half the original distance. the chimes sound was still coming from object and i knew then that a few tank would not produce any sound unless it was leaking high pressure or something like that? i touched the object to see if it was hot. it was neither hot or cold and as i touched it the chimes sound went away to a solid picted sound wave. about a c note? i knew then that this was some sort of military part most likely but why it had moved closer to my truck and appeared in its original flight path to move strangly, i knew the object was not a tank off some airplane or space craft .  i went on ahead and touched it again and it was like a 10 second morse code was chimed out then silence again and i finally pick object off ground. it was somewhat heavy and felt like what a gyroscope feels like or a bike tire spinning as you hold the axel in your hands and the tire is spinning. so it felt as if it had some weight about 20 pounts maybe but not like picking a solid off the ground. always a feeling as if there was some form of gyro inside the object. every now and then there would be a chime like sound. i knew at this time this was not normal. i decided to take object with me home. after getting home i began using my tuning forks to fine the pitch it wwould make and every time i used a tuning fork it would respond witht the same chime like sounds and about 10 second would the chime like sound stay steady and then dissapear. i have now placed object into a hidden place in another state and would like to know how i could make sure this object is studied but not by military or any agency that would hide it from the public. this is first time i have allowed anyone to know of this object . i will not allow this object to be taken and will not place object where some special team of people can infiltrate and hide this onject from the public. so i need information as to how such can be studied by others but not placed into a situation where the government can hide this find? i want truth and pure absolute truth and ability to maintain object in my protected hands until i decide to allow it to be examined. it will reproduce the chimes like sounds any time i want to interact with sphere. i repeat what country or how can i present this find to the world and yet maintain such a force to never allow the government to stale this object or cover this up in any way. i know that there will be someone knocking at my door or following me to find where object is hidden but they will not ever find ths sphere without me. so any help would be helpful thank you so much
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sphere object found

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work about 11pm heading east from bayport inn a bright light in the sky was following me for 5-6 miles.When i stopped at the stop sign at us 19 i noticed it getting darker then realized there was no more light but an object come from behind me and i watched it stop a few feet in front of my car.I looked up thru my windshield and this object was dark and smooth and flat. i looked out my rear and side windows and realized it was perfectly round.I was thinking if there was 1 car in front of me and 1 in the back and if i drew a cicle around them that was the size of this object that was just hovering over my car. if i stood on the roof of my car and stretched i could have touched the bottom of this thing.I then saw that my dashlights were slowly dimming and my headlights doing the same until my car stalled.I heard a woosh and this thing took off north on us19 and i watched it make a complete stop.Then it took off west towards the gulf in a matter of seconds.I had such a sense of calm even starting when the light in the sky was following me.In hindsight i should of been scared to death when it was hovering over my car but it just seemed  fascinating. my old car started right up and i went home.I think about it every day and over the years told anyone who would listen. the next morning i reported it to the sheriff office and they said it was probably the military testing aircraft off the coast.This was a flying saucer that i witnessed.About a year ago i googled flying saucer and car stalling and was amazed with reports like mine.To my amazement i come across abductee john reeves which his experiences happened a couple miles from mine back in the 60's.
content.summary: Light in sky was following me then hovered over my car.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out of my window when i noticed a black ball in the sky.
it had no lights whatsoever and it was zig zag flying all over the place  it would remain still but then zig zag and then go back to still again.

i knew something was wrong as soon as i saw it based on the flight pattern and there was no light.
not to mention the shape
content.summary: Saw strange black orb zigzag flying

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo spotted on the 24/05/2017 a freind from
texas sent me video he filmed after seeing white flash in it after analysis i found a lot more video shoes a large ufo observing thunder lighting storm then somthing shots or returns to it its amazing proof.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo spotted during thunder storm then somthing shots at it or fly back to it

content.detailedDescription: So i just saw a light in the sky travel very fast out the window and disappear behind some trees behind my apartment.   there are no stars in the sky and this traveled much faster than any  airplane.  i request that david whitehouse investigate this incident.
content.summary: Light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At  approximately 1100 pm on may 26 2017 i was going to bed and looked out my window facing south. i noticed two objects under low cloud cover. the objects glowed red orange and at first i thought they might be helicopters however they began to bounce and wobble in flight. at this time i went out my front door to attempt to hear any sound from the objects and there was none. i went back inside acquired my binoculars went out again and looked at the objects through the binoculars. the shape appeared round with pulsating light but i could not observe any structure. the objects continued from south to north at a slow steady pace and finally diapered in lower cloud cover. i was extremely surprised to obverse objects behaving in this manner over town and the fact they made no noise was strange. my wife also observed the objects. we discussed the possibility of drones but it just didn't make sense. we then decided the report the incident.
content.summary: Red orange pulsated and wobbled. two objects one behind the other pulsating light when viewed with binoculars wobbled in flight.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 24th around 10:30-10:45pm it was cloudy,drizzling i was facing ne, with my night vision camera on tripod i zoomed in saw 2 yellow-orange orb's zipping around for about 15sec's then flew off.

same night around 11:30pm a bright red-orange orb came in(1:14 in to video b) and was hovering for 20sec's before zipping off ne at high rate of speed. as you can see in the video drizzle and debris was moving but the orb wasn't till it flew off. 

the night was cloudy, drizzling, breezy. the objects i would say where about 1000ft + high, i had to max out the night vision zoom on camera.

to be honest, i didn't think i was going to see anything that night but i felt i had to try, this is my second report in like 2 months. wtf!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Video a 2 orb's yellow-orange zipping around, video b bright orb red-orange. very fast!

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en e patio de mi casa regando el jardín, cuando lo vi llame a la familia, de inmediato me di cuenta que no era algo hecho por el hombre, el objeto esta muy brillante igual a una esfera plateada sin puertas ni ventanas o letras ni luces de colores, tendría un diámetro aproximado de unos 5 metros y su trayectoria siempre fue rectilínea y uniforme, mi reacción fue llamar a la familia para que ellos también fuesen testigos, el fenómeno duro como 5 minutos hasta que el objeto se perdió sobre los cerros.
content.summary: El objeto era plateado de como 5 metros de diametro se desplazaba en absoluto silencio y describio una trayectoria uniforme en todo momento
